mapper.select: select b.bed_no , b.bed_status , b.ward_no , c.code_name from bed b, common_code c where b.bed_status = c.code_no

select p.patnt_no , m.mem_no , b.bed_no , w.ward_no , hr.hsptlz_no , rec.receipt_no , ch.chart_no , p.patnt_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , mm.mem_name as emp_name , e.emp_no from hospitalization_record hr, bed b, "ORDER" o, chart ch, patient p, member m, ward w, emp e, member mm, receipt rec where hr.bed_no = b.bed_no and b.ward_no = w.ward_no and hr.order_no = o.order_no and o.chart_no = ch.chart_no and ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no and p.mem_no = m.mem_no and o.emp_no = e.emp_no and e.mem_no = mm.mem_no and ch.receipt_no = rec.receipt_no and hr.hsptlz_leave_date is NULL order by ward_no, bed_no

SELECT ch.chart_no , o.order_no , ch.chart_record , m.mem_name , mem.mem_name AS emp_name , cc.code_name AS body_code , comm.code_name AS order_code , CASE WHEN o.order_code = 'OD007' THEN ( SELECT LISTAGG(mdcin_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mdcin_name) FROM prescription pr INNER JOIN medicine m ON pr.mdcin_no = m.mdcin_no WHERE pr.order_no = o.order_no ) ELSE NULL END AS mdcin_names FROM chart ch INNER JOIN receipt r ON r.receipt_no = ch.receipt_no INNER JOIN "ORDER" o ON ch.chart_no = o.chart_no INNER JOIN patient p ON ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no INNER JOIN emp e ON o.emp_no = e.emp_no INNER JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no INNER JOIN member mem ON e.mem_no = mem.mem_no INNER JOIN common_code comm ON o.order_code = comm.code_no LEFT JOIN common_code cc ON o.body_code = cc.code_no WHERE ch.chart_no = #{chartNo}

SELECT hr.hsptlz_no , hr.HSPTLZ_START_DATE , b.bed_no , c.code_name , w.ward_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , mm.mem_name AS emp_name , p.patnt_no , r.receipt_no , o.order_no , v.pressure_max , v.pressure_min , v.vital_pulse , v.vital_heat , v.vital_date , v.respiration_min FROM hospitalization_record hr INNER JOIN bed b ON hr.bed_no = b.bed_no INNER JOIN ward w ON b.ward_no = w.ward_no INNER JOIN "ORDER" o ON hr.order_no = o.order_no INNER JOIN chart ch ON o.chart_no = ch.chart_no INNER JOIN receipt r ON ch.receipt_no = r.receipt_no INNER JOIN patient p ON ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no INNER JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no INNER JOIN common_code c ON b.bed_status = c.code_no INNER JOIN emp e ON o.emp_no = e.emp_no INNER JOIN member mm ON e.mem_no = mm.mem_no LEFT JOIN vital v ON v.hsptlz_no = hr.hsptlz_no WHERE p.patnt_no = #{patntNo}
select mdcin_no , mdcin_name , mdcin_quantity , mdcin_unit , mdcin_company , mdcin_course , mdcin_price from medicine

SELECT mr.medicine_request_no, m.mdcin_name, mr.medicine_request_quantity, mr.medicine_request_date, member.mem_name, cc.code_name, mrr.medicine_result_date, mrr.medicine_result_disagree, mem.mem_name AS result_emp FROM medicine m INNER JOIN medicine_request mr ON m.mdcin_no = mr.mdcin_no LEFT JOIN medicine_request_result mrr ON mr.medicine_request_no = mrr.medicine_request_no LEFT JOIN emp e ON mrr.medicine_result_emp = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN member mem ON e.mem_no = mem.mem_no LEFT JOIN emp emp ON mr.medicine_request_person = emp.emp_no LEFT JOIN member member ON emp.mem_no = member.mem_no LEFT JOIN common_code cc ON mrr.medicine_result_agree = cc.code_no WHERE mrr.medicine_result_date IS NULL OR (TRUNC(mrr.medicine_result_date) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 3 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)) ORDER BY mrr.medicine_result_date, mr.medicine_request_no

SELECT w.ward_no, b.bed_no, c.code_name AS bed_status, CASE WHEN b.bed_status = 'BS001' THEN NULL ELSE m.mem_no END AS mem_no, CASE WHEN b.bed_status = 'BS001' THEN NULL ELSE m.mem_name END AS mem_name, CASE WHEN b.bed_status = 'BS001' THEN NULL ELSE m.mem_gender END AS mem_gender, CASE WHEN b.bed_status = 'BS001' THEN NULL ELSE m.mem_age END AS mem_age, CASE WHEN b.bed_status = 'BS001' THEN NULL ELSE hr.hsptlz_no END AS hsptlz_no, CASE WHEN b.bed_status = 'BS001' THEN NULL ELSE hr.hsptlz_start_date END AS hsptlz_start_date FROM ward w INNER JOIN bed b ON b.ward_no = w.ward_no LEFT JOIN hospitalization_record hr ON b.bed_no = hr.bed_no AND b.bed_status != 'BS001' LEFT JOIN "ORDER" o ON hr.order_no = o.order_no LEFT JOIN chart ch ON o.chart_no = ch.chart_no LEFT JOIN patient p ON ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no LEFT JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no LEFT JOIN common_code c ON b.bed_status = c.code_no WHERE w.ward_no = #{wardNo} and hr.hsptlz_leave_date is null ORDER BY b.bed_no

SELECT o.order_no , ch.chart_no , c.code_name AS order_code , cc.code_name AS body_code , mem.mem_name AS emp_name , m.mem_no , p.patnt_no , m.mem_name FROM "ORDER" o JOIN chart ch ON o.chart_no = ch.chart_no JOIN patient p ON ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no JOIN emp e ON o.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN member mem ON e.mem_no = mem.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code c ON o.order_code = c.code_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code cc ON o.body_code = cc.code_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hospitalization_record hr ON hr.order_no = o.order_no WHERE o.order_code = 'OD004' AND hr.order_no IS NULL

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO hospitalization_record ( hsptlz_no , order_no , bed_no , hsptlz_start_date ) SELECT hospitalization_record_seq.NEXTVAL ,#{item.orderVO.orderNo} ,#{item.bedVO.bedNo} ,sysdate FROM DUAL

mapper.update: UPDATE bed SET bed_status = 'BS002' WHERE bed_no = #{bedVO.bedNo}
mapper.select: select mem_no , mem_name , mem_age , mem_gender , mem_tel , mem_address1 , mem_address2 from member where mem_no = #{memNo}
select w.ward_no , b.bed_no from bed b, ward w, common_code c where b.ward_no = w.ward_no and b.bed_status = c.code_no and b.bed_status = 'BS001' order by ward_no, bed_no

SELECT DISTINCT m.mem_no ,m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , cc.code_name as order_code , hr.hsptlz_no FROM member m JOIN patient p ON m.mem_no = p.mem_no JOIN chart ch ON p.patnt_no = ch.patnt_no JOIN "ORDER" o ON ch.chart_no = o.chart_no JOIN hospitalization_record hr ON o.order_no = hr.order_no LEFT JOIN surgery s ON o.order_no = s.order_no LEFT JOIN common_code cc ON o.order_code = cc.code_no WHERE o.order_code = 'OD005' AND s.order_no IS NULL

select p.patnt_no , m.mem_name , pi.inspct_blood , pi.inspct_elecgrm , pi.inspct_urine , pi.inspct_description , pi.inspct_date from pre_inspection pi, hospitalization_record hr, "ORDER" o, chart ch, patient p, member m where pi.hsptlz_no = hr.hsptlz_no and hr.order_no = o.order_no and o.chart_no = ch.chart_no and ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no and p.mem_no = m.mem_no and hr.hsptlz_no = #{hsptlzNo}

SELECT m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_gender , m.mem_age , m.mem_regno1 , m.mem_tel , p.patnt_no , r.receipt_no , r.receipt_reason , c.code_name , cc.code_name AS ccodeName , r.receipt_date , ch.chart_no FROM member m INNER JOIN patient p ON m.mem_no = p.mem_no INNER JOIN receipt r ON p.patnt_no = r.patnt_no LEFT JOIN history h ON r.receipt_no = h.receipt_no LEFT JOIN chart ch ON ch.receipt_no = r.receipt_no LEFT JOIN common_code c ON c.code_no = h.history_loc LEFT JOIN common_code cc ON cc.code_no = h.history_status WHERE r.receipt_status ='RS001' and h.history_no is not null

select m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , e.emp_no , mem.mem_name as emp_name , r.receipt_date , ch.chart_no , o.order_no , com.code_name as order_code , o.body_code , cc.code_name as body_code , hr.hsptlz_start_date , hr.hsptlz_leave_date , hr.hsptlz_leave_reason from receipt r inner join history h on r.receipt_no = h.history_no inner join patient p on r.patnt_no = p.patnt_no inner join chart ch on r.receipt_no = ch.receipt_no inner join "ORDER" o on ch.chart_no = o.chart_no inner join emp e on r.emp_no = e.emp_no inner join member m on p.mem_no = m.mem_no inner join member mem on e.mem_no = mem.mem_no inner join common_code cc on o.body_code = cc.code_no inner join common_code com on o.order_code = com.code_no left join hospitalization_record hr on hr.order_no = o.order_no where r.receipt_status = 'RS004' and m.mem_no = #{memNo}

select m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , e.emp_no , mem.mem_name as emp_name , r.receipt_no , r.receipt_date , ch.chart_no , o.order_no , cc.code_name as body_code from receipt r, history h, patient p, chart ch, "ORDER" o, emp e, member m, member mem, common_code cc where r.receipt_no = h.history_no and r.receipt_no = ch.receipt_no and ch.chart_no = o.chart_no and o.body_code = cc.code_no and r.patnt_no = p.patnt_no and p.mem_no = m.mem_no and r.emp_no = e.emp_no and e.mem_no = mem.mem_no and ch.chart_no = #{chartNo}

SELECT m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , m.mem_regno1 , m.mem_regno2 , m.mem_tel , m.mem_addtel , pro.protector_name , pro.protector_tel , pro.protector_relate , pd.pre_diagnosis_exp , pd.pre_diagnosis_disease , pd.pre_diagnosis_allergy FROM member m INNER JOIN patient p ON m.mem_no = p.mem_no LEFT JOIN protector pro ON p.patnt_no = pro.patnt_no LEFT JOIN pre_diagnosis pd ON p.patnt_no = pd.patnt_no LEFT JOIN receipt r ON p.patnt_no = r.patnt_no WHERE m.mem_type = 'MT002' AND m.mem_no = #{memNo} AND pd.receipt_no = r.receipt_no AND r.receipt_no = #{receiptNo}

SELECT m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , pro.protector_name , pro.protector_tel , cc.code_name as body_code , hr.hsptlz_no , hr.hsptlz_start_date FROM bed b INNER JOIN hospitalization_record hr ON b.bed_no = hr.bed_no INNER JOIN "ORDER" o ON hr.order_no = o.order_no INNER JOIN chart ch ON o.chart_no = ch.chart_no INNER JOIN patient p ON ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no INNER JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no INNER JOIN common_code cc ON o.body_code = cc.code_no LEFT JOIN protector pro ON pro.patnt_no = p.patnt_no WHERE hr.hsptlz_leave_date IS NULL AND b.bed_no = #{bedNo}

SELECT o.order_no , ch.chart_no , c.code_name as order_code , cc.code_name as body_code , m.mem_no , p.patnt_no , m.mem_name , mem.mem_name as emp_name FROM HOSPITALIZATION_RECORD hr INNER JOIN "ORDER" o ON hr.order_no = o.order_no INNER JOIN chart ch ON o.chart_no = ch.chart_no JOIN patient p ON ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no JOIN emp e ON o.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN member mem ON e.mem_no = mem.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code c ON o.order_code = c.code_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code cc ON o.body_code = cc.code_no WHERE hr.order_no IN ( SELECT o.order_no FROM "ORDER" o WHERE o.chart_no IN ( SELECT ch.chart_no FROM CHART ch WHERE ch.chart_no IN ( SELECT o.chart_no FROM "ORDER" o WHERE o.order_code = 'OD010' ) ) and hr.hsptlz_leave_date is null )

select m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_age , m.mem_gender , m.mem_tel , m.mem_address1 , m.mem_address2 , r.receipt_no , hr.bed_no , ch.chart_no , hr.hsptlz_start_date , w.ward_no from hospitalization_record hr, "ORDER" o, chart ch, patient p, member m, receipt r, bed b, ward w where hr.order_no = o.order_no and o.chart_no = ch.chart_no and ch.receipt_no = r.receipt_no and ch.patnt_no = p.patnt_no and p.mem_no = m.mem_no and hr.bed_no = b.bed_no and b.ward_no = w.ward_no and hr.hsptlz_leave_date is null and m.mem_no = #{memNo}

SELECT nr.nursing_no, nr.nursing_date, nr.nursing_content, m.mem_name, mem.mem_name as emp_name, io.io_intake, io.io_emissions, v.pressure_max, v.pressure_min, v.vital_pulse, v.respiration_min, v.vital_heat FROM hospitalization_record hr INNER JOIN nursing_record nr ON hr.hsptlz_no = nr.hsptlz_no LEFT JOIN io io ON hr.hsptlz_no = io.hsptlz_no LEFT JOIN vital v ON hr.hsptlz_no = v.hsptlz_no INNER JOIN patient p ON nr.patnt_no = p.patnt_no INNER JOIN emp e ON nr.nursing_writer = e.emp_no INNER JOIN member m ON p.mem_no = m.mem_no INNER JOIN member mem ON e.mem_no = mem.mem_no where p.patnt_no = #{patntNo}

WITH StatusCounts AS ( SELECT b.bed_status , COUNT(*) AS status_count FROM bed b WHERE b.ward_no = #{wardNo} GROUP BY b.bed_status ) SELECT sc.bed_status , sc.status_count , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bed WHERE ward_no = #{wardNo}) AS total_count FROM StatusCounts sc ORDER BY sc.bed_status
